channel.title: [SFoL] SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtous III - Signups (FULL)
channel.description:
The Unseen have won. New Unseen members flooded into the castle, with a promise of power and money. Their former enemies, the Blue Dragon and the Hand of Byzantium, have been entirely wiped out. Or so they thought, until they found the Marauder dead, a knife in his back and a note attached. "*We will take back our lands and overthrow your reign of terror.*" # Welcome to SFoL 67: Last Stand of the Virtuous III ! ## Hosted by @EliThePsycho and @Arctic
Phase Length: Day Phase: 48 Hours Night Phase: 24 Hours Day 1: 24 hours but no execution Game will start soon after it is filled.
**Scum Faction: 50% chance BD, 50% chance HoB**
[color = steblue] **Heroine** [/color] = [color = goldenrod] **Champion** [/color] = Scum Killer [color = steblue] **Visionary** [/color] = [color = goldenrod] **Arbiter** [/color] = Scum Converter
Game Setup: 18 players King (60% [color = purple] **Corrupted**[/color], 40% [color = steblue] **Righteous** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Purified**[/color]) [color = steblue] **Visionary** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Arbiter** [/color] [color = steblue] **Heroine** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Champion** [/color] [color = purple] **Duke** [/color] [color = purple] **Marshal** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] [color = purple] **Random Unseen** [/color] / [color = grey] **Random Neutral Non-Killer** [/color] [color = grey] **Random Neutral Non-Killer** [/color] [color = grey] **Neutral Killer** [/color]
18-er, King, 12-13 Unseen, 1-2 Non NK Neuts, 2 BD or HoB, 1 NK
**Neutral Killer Win Condition is to make it to the final 4 players alive (with exceptions for specific Nks). If the NK accomplishes this, they instantly win and every other class that is not a Neutral who has achieved their win condition, loses.** **The Blue Dragon and Hand of Byzantium can convert night 1, and all conversions have a 1-night cooldown after the previous conversion succeeded. They may have up to three members alive.** **The entire court will be informed publicly from the host in public chat if the King ever chooses to use Grand Trial or Royal Pardon, and if the latter, on who.** **"No Execution" is always a valid vote. It is possible to hammer "No Execution" to end the day early without an execution. If "No Execution" is not hammered by the end of the day, someone will die unless everyone abstained.** **No Unseen class besides the Corrupted King is unconvertible. All Neutral classes are still unconvertable though, of course. Limit of 3 copies of any non-unique class. If there is nothing that can stop one of the main factions or the neutral killers from winning, the game will end in a victory for whoever it applies to.**
# **Classes:**
[details="Kings"] > # [color=purple]The Corrupted King :shield: :fire: [/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. If you are executed for treason, all players will lose their Royal Blood passive. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This ability can only used during the first half (24 hours) of each day. Cannot target yourself. - 2 uses **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be executed. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Praetorian Guard (Night)** - Sends a guard to a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Imperial Advisers (Night)** - Sends an adviser to a player. They will be immune to conversions for the night. - 3 uses **Permanent Scheme (Night)** - Target player will be immune to conversion for the rest of the game - One use (Starting King Only) *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>Crowned from: > * Any member of the Unseen. --- > # [color=steblue]The Righteous King :shield: [/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be executed. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This ability can only used during the first half (24 hours) of each day. Cannot target yourself. - 2 uses **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Swear Fealty (Night)** - All [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color] players will appear to be a member of the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color] tonight. - One use *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>Crowned From: > * Any member of the Blue Dragon. --- > # [color = goldenrod] The Purified King :shield: [/color] > [color = goldenrod] **Hand of Byzantium Special** [/color] **Dynastic Cycle (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be executed. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This ability can only used during the first half (24 hours) of each day. Cannot target yourself. - 2 uses **Champion's Council (Night)** - Sends a champion (An assistant champion, different than the real [color = goldenrod]**Champion**[/color], does not affect the current [color = goldenrod]**Champion**[/color]'s actions) to attack a player. This attack does not count as a visit and cannot be stopped. Can only be used on the second night or after that you are crowned. - One use **Hero's Immunity (Night)** - Permanently makes a player be seen as a member of the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color] to faction checks. - 2 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>Crowned from: > * Any member of the Hand of Byzantium

If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be executed. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Sadistic Guards (Night)** - Allows the Tyrannous King to select two players who will then be attacked and killed by his guards. - Infinite uses _Your objective is to make it to the last four players alive while the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium cannot achieve a majority vote against you on their own._

This ability can only used during the first half (24 hours) of each day. Cannot target yourself. - 2 uses **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be executed. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Karma (Night)** - Marks a player as a target, permanently frames them, and learns their class type. Does not work if the target is not aligned with the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]. - Infinite uses **Draconian Law (Night)** - Marks a player as a target if they are aligned with the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]. They will silently require two less votes to be executed for the coming day. - 2 uses *See two of your marked targets publicly executed.*
>Crowned from: > * The Crone --- ># [color = firebrick]The Vampiric King[/color] :shield: :fire: > **[color = firebrick] Neutral Special [/color]** **Dynastic Cycle (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Head of State (Passive)** - You will always be under the effect of Vampirism and you will know all living players who are Bitten. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This ability can only used during the first half (24 hours) of each day. Cannot target yourself. - 2 uses **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be executed. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Vampiric Envoy (Night)** - Bites a player, infecting them with Vampirism, preventing healing, and occupying them. Players infected with Vampirism will be shown as a Neutral and a Killer for investigative abilities and will have their visits hidden. The first two times this ability succeeds, you will heal yourself. - Infinite uses *Make sure at least half of the living remainder of the Court is infected with Vampirism by the end of the game.*
>Crowned from: > * The Strigoi [/details]
[details = Unseen] > # [color = purple] **The Marshal** :shield: :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Investigative** [/color] **Tireless (Passive)** - If you do not perform an action at night, you will learn if any of your previous uses of Expert Investigation and Case Closed showed incorrect results and which ones were incorrect. **Scout (Day)** - Your scout will inform you whether a particular player has been visited by a member of the [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color] or the [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] tonight and the faction of the player that visited your target if so. - Infinite uses **Peerless Confidant (Day)** - Employ your most trusted confidant to keep watch on two players at once tonight. This confidant will tell you if either or both players are visited by a member of the [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color] or the [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] tonight and the faction of the player(s) that visited your target(s) if so. - One use **Expert Investigation (Night)** - If a player is a member of the [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color] or the [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color], learn their faction. - Infinite uses **Case Closed (Night)** - Very carefully examine a player tonight. If they are a member of the [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color] or the [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color], learn their exact class. - 2 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Sheriff**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**The Agent**[/color] --- > # [color = purple] The Duke :shield: :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Killer** [/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied and redirected at night. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Kidnap (Day)** - Choose a player to kidnap at night, This occupies them while bypassing occupation immunity and preventing all visits to targeted player. You and them may also exchange up to two 1000 character messages. - Infinite uses **Execute (Night)** - Kill the kidnapped player bypassing any and all immunites as the most powerful form of night attack in the game. If you execute a member of the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color], you lose all your remaining executions. - 3 uses, available starting Night 2 *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**The Warden**[/color] --- > # [color = purple] The Marchioness [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Investigative** [/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Your votes for King will count twice. **VIP List (Day)** - By the end of the coming night, you will know how many players of different factions visited you but will not be told which factions. - 2 uses **Social Links (Night)** - Select two players and you will receive a positive result providing both targets’ class type groupings match. Groups are Special/Investigative, Social/Support, and Killer/Offensive. You will receive either no match if they are from different groups, a good match if they are in the same group, and a perfect match if they are the same class type. For this ability, any [color = goldenrod]**Arbiter**[/color] and the first [color = steblue]**Visionary**[/color] will appear to be the class they have asked to appear as to the host at the start of the game. - Infinite uses **Night Waltz (Night)** - Select two players and you will receive a positive result providing both targets’ alignments match; otherwise a negative result. - One use *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Maid**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**The Socialite**[/color] --- > # [color = purple] The Minstrel [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Support** [/color] **Pure Wits (Day)** - In the coming night you will be immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing. - 3 uses **Ballad (Night)** - Cure a player’s bleeding. They will also be occupation, redirection and night immune tonight. - 2 uses **Crescendo (Night)** - If your target is redirecting, occupying, or attacking, then they will bypass immunities during this night. - Infinite uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Chronomancer**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**The Bard**[/color] --- > # [color = purple] The Archivist :shield: [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Social** [/color] **Prestige (Passive)** - Only up to two classes with Prestige may spawn; including the starting [color = steblue] **Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] class (if the starting [color = steblue] **Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] class has Prestige, their equivalent [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color] class cannot spawn). **Repository (Passive)** - You start in a public log network by yourself. Players in the network will be allowed to read the logs of any other player in the network. The Repository remains open while the archivist is still alive regardless if they have been converted. **Archive (Day)** - Invites a player to the log network. The player must accept before joining and can choose to leave at anytime. Can only invite two players per day. - Infinite uses **Revoke (Night)** - Removes a player from the log network. - Infinite uses **Censorship (Night)** - Deactivates the [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] day chat for the next day and night. - One use *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Princess**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**The Librarian**[/color] --- > # [color = purple] The Baronet [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Killer** [/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Your votes for King will count twice. **Gerissen (Passive)** - If you have killed any [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]-aligned players in the match, then you will not be allowed to receive votes to become the King. **Missgunst (Day)** - Grants night immunity for the coming night. If any attack is blocked then you will gain a use of Vom Tach. - 2 uses **Mittelhau (Night)** - Redirects the selected player’s action to you while also granting yourself immunity to all redirected attacks and conversions, then attack the player. If you successfully kill a player then you will gain a use of Vom Tach. Disables your night abilities if the target is aligned with the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]. - Infinite uses **Vom Tach (Night)** - Prevents you from being occupied or redirected, then attacks your target and kills them, bypassing healing and night immunity. Disables your night abilities if the target is aligned with the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]. - 0 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=steblue]**The Hunter**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**The Duelist**[/color]
> # [color=purple]The Arcanist[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] > **Arcane Focus (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection at night. > **Sigil of Illusion (Night)** - Place a sigil of illusion on a player. The sigil will activate at the start of the next night. If the targetted player would be converted while the sigil is active, they will die instead and the conversion will be put on cooldown. Can only have one sigil of illusion up at a time. Infinite uses > **Sigil of Madness (Night)** - Invoke madness itself upon a player tonight. Any action they take, besides conversion, will bypass immunities and yield correct information should they get it. Will not bypass passive tailor effects. 2 uses > > *Defeat the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts to [color=steblue]**The Archer**[/color] or [color=goldenrod]**The Thaumaturge**[/color] --- > # [color = purple] The Blasphemer :shield: [/color] > [color = purple] **Unseen Social** [/color] **Incantations (Passive)** - You may speak with the dead during the night. **Prestige (Passive)** - Only up to two classes with Prestige may spawn; including the starting [color = steblue] **Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] class (if the starting [color = steblue] **Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] class has Prestige, their equivalent [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color] class cannot spawn). **Heretical Decree (Day)** - If target player is executed today and is a member of the [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color] with a non-unique, non-Prestige class, you will remove them from dead chat. - One use **Spirit Swap (Day)** - Tonight, you will resurrect the player you removed from dead chat using Heretical Decree and sacrifice yourself if you succeed. You may not use any night abilities tonight. - One use **Black Mercy (Night)** - Select a dead [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]-aligned player and force them to use their primary night action on a living one. There can always be a second and third [color = steblue]**Visionary**[/color] unless the current [color = steblue]**Visionary**[/color] dies as the last member of the [color = steblue]**Blue Dragon**[/color]. Abilities prevented this way will be considered delayed and can be redirected with Distort Reality on the following night. - 2 uses *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* --- > # [color=steblue]The Court Sorceress[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] **Prestige (Passive)** - Only up to two classes with Prestige may spawn; including the starting [color = steblue] **Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] class (if the starting [color = steblue] **Blue Dragon**[/color] or [color = goldenrod]**Hand of Byzantium**[/color] class has Prestige, their equivalent [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color] class cannot spawn). Can only target King as the first target. **Crushing Guilt (Night)** - If an [color = purple]**Unseen**[/color]-aligned player was executed the previous day, then you can select two players who’ve voted to execute and cause them to commit suicide by guilt, bypassing healing, and not counting as visits. - 2 uses :crown: _Your objective is to make it to at least (possibly fewer depending on the state of BD / HoB) the last two players alive while the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium do not hold a majority over the court on their own._ --- ># [color = darkred] The Ifrit [/color] :shield: :fire: > **[color = darkred] Neutral Killer [/color]** >**Djinn Form (Passive)** - Grants you immunity to occupation, redirection, bleeding, and death at night. **Burning Transformation (Day)** - Upon killing a target, you will cause them to flip a class of your choice. If you successfully kills a player this night, you will be able to see their true class. - 2 uses **Heat Wave (Day)** - Occupies all targets who try to visit you the coming night. Bypasses immunity to occupation. - 3 uses **Incinerate (Night)** - Kills a player by burning them alive. Players that have been incinerated will have their logs erased. Only you will see the player’s original logs. - Infinite uses :crown: **Fires of Jahannam (Night)** - Prevents all visits to the target player and attacks them, erasing their logs if they die. - 3 uses :crown: _Your objective is to make it to at least (possibly fewer depending on the state of BD / HoB) the last four players alive while the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium do not hold a majority over the court on their own._ --- > # [color = slateblue] The Lich [/color] :shield: :fire: >**[color = slateblue] Neutral Killer [/color]** **Phylactery (Passive)** - During Day One, you shall specify two players to be our Phylactery Holders. If you fail to do so before the end of the day, they are randomized. They can not choose The King to be their holder, nor can The King be a randomized Holder. You will know their starting classes, and will be night immune while at least one of them lives. If both of them die, you will die the following night. Investigations against the Phylactery Holders will also yield the additional message “You feel a chill surrounding the target player. They are a Phylactery Holder for The Lich.” If your Phylactery Holders die, this fact that they are one will be included with their class information. **Undeath (Passive)** - As long as the Phylactery Holders are alive, at the start of every night you will automatically revive yourself if you are dead, regardless of how you died. **Spectral Mist (Day)** - A target Phylactery Holder is healed tonight. - 3 uses **Black Fog (Day)** - Attempts to investigate either of the Phylactery Holders will fail tonight. - 3 uses **Finger of Decay (Night)** - Kill a player. If you were revived at the start of the night, then this attack bypasses night immunity and healing. - Infinite uses :crown: **Death’s Curtains (Night)** - Kill one of your Phylactery holders (bypasses night immunity and healing), and two other targets. - Infinite uses, but only usable while you have two Phylactery Holders alive :crown: _Your objective is to make it to at least (possibly fewer depending on the state of BD / HoB) the last four players alive while the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium do not hold a majority over the court on their own._ --- ># [color=orange]The Mind Flayer :shield: :fire:[/color] > >[color=orange]**Neutral Killer**[/color] **Insanity (Passive)** - You are immune to death at night, occupation and redirection. You are immune to bleeding, and are informed of being bled. **Mindstorm (Passive)** - Once per night you may guess a player’s class. If you are correct you will empower your attack **Brain Destruction** to bypass protections. This passive will be disabled if you guess incorrectly twice. Cannot Target the King, nor can target the same person after a successful guess. **Mind Read (Day)** - Mimic one of the main night investigative abilities of an Unseen Investigative class, targeting a player of your choice. After using one once, cannot use abilities from different classes. Will return results at the end of the night. - 4 Uses **Brain Destruction (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite Uses :crown: **Shape Knowledge (Night)** - Use an ability belonging to a player you have killed with Brain Destruction on a player of your choice. You cannot use these abilities more than once, and certain abilities are denoted as not able to be used. For non-killing abilities, they may be done alongside Brain Destruction. Cannot use conversion. - Infinite Uses _Your objective is to make it to at least (possibly fewer depending on the state of BD / HoB) the last four players alive while the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium do not hold a majority over the court on their own._ --- ># [color = orchid] The Succubus [/color] :shield: :fire: >**[color = orchid] Neutral Killer [/color]** >**Dependency (Passive)** - If you die during the night or you are executed, all drained players will also die with you the following night. **Transfer Life (Day)** - Allows you to kill a drained player overnight, provided they are not healed or night immune, during the coming night and transfer their remaining life in turns to another drained player. This will also heal the latter player. If you transfers to yourself, then you will gain a charge of Love’s Malady instead. If the first player is healed then the ability will still function but without the first player dying. - Infinite uses :crown: **Infatuation (Day)** - When this ability is activated, all drained playerfs will have their votes locked to a target for the remainder of the day. - 2 uses **Vital Drain (Night)** - Learns the target player’s class type and will drain them to death over the next two nights. While there is at least one player being drained then you will heal yourself if you are attacked or bleeding. If a drained player is healed then their timer until they are drained to death will not lower for the night but neither the healer nor the player will be notified. Does not count as an attack. - Infinite uses :crown: **Love's Malady (Night)** - Makes the user immune to occupation and redirection for the night and instantly kills a player while bypassing Night Immunity, healing, and does not count as visiting. - 0 uses :crown: _Your objective is to make it to at least (possibly fewer depending on the state of BD / HoB) the last four players alive while the Blue Dragon or Hand of Byzantium do not hold a majority over the court on their own._ [/details] [details="Conversion Chart"] [color = purple] **Alcoholic** [/color] and [color = purple] **Bureaucrat** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Drunk** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Overseer** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Aristocrat** [/color] and [color = purple] **Judge** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Noble** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Magistrate** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Duchess** [/color] and [color = purple] **Archivist** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Princess** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Librarian** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Enforcer** [/color] and [color = purple] **Fanatic** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Knight** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Crusader** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Handmaiden** [/color] and [color = purple] **Marchioness** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Maid** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Socialite** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Illusionist** [/color] and [color = purple] **Exiled** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Mystic** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Cabalist** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Marshal** [/color] (Same class no matter which scum faction) converts to either [color = steblue] **Sheriff** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Agent** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Duke** [/color] and [color = purple] **Torturer** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Prince** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Warden** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Page** [/color] (Same class no matter which scum faction) converts to either [color = steblue] **Squire** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Squire** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Nightwatch** [/color] and [color = purple] **Stalker** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Observer** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Watchman** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Poacher** [/color] and [color = purple] **Baronet** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Hunter** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Duelist** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Sage** [/color] and [color = purple] **Forest Witch** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Court Sorceress** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Druid** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Servant** [/color] and [color = purple] **Infiltrator** [/color] both converts to either [color = steblue] **Butler** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Sentinel** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Herbalist** [/color] and [color = purple] **Plague Doctor** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Physician** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Surgeon** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Soulcatcher** [/color] and [color = purple] **Blasphemer** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Priest** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Saint** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Arbalest** [/color] and [color = purple] **Arcanist** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Archer** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Thaumaturge** [/color] depending on game type. [color = purple] **Timesnatcher** [/color] and [color = purple] **Minstrel** [/color] both convert to either [color = steblue] **Chronomancer** [/color] or [color = goldenrod] **Bard** [/color] depending on game type.
[/details] # tl;dr changes from virtous II * 18p instead of 16p * A lot of neutrals & their respective Kings removed * Marauder has been replaced with Arcanist, Warrior has been replaced with Thaumaturge * Arbiter has been reworded * Neutral Killers have been changed and/or removed * Bounty has been changed (check Aristocrat, Magistrate, and Noble classcards for further info)
**Players**:
1. Atlas 1. Intensify 1. Frostwolf103 1. YoubutWorse 1. Ciri 1. an_gorta_pratia 1. Bacon_is_Executed 1. PokemonKidRyan 1. Wazza 1. Amelia 1. Aelin 1. clonedcheese 1. Leafia 1. CoconutsTasteBad 1. Emilia 1. Silviu 1. GGhana 1. Whysper
**Backups**:
1. thepigeonnyc 1. WindwardAway 1. ATNoName 1.
**Spectators (informed)**:
1. DatBird 1. katze 1. Jane (uninformed) 1. Marshal (uninformed) 1. Chloe (uninformed) 1. CRichard 1. Appelsiini (uninformed) 1. Arete 1. Alice (uninformed) 1.
### We will try to follow standard limited FoL feedback as much as we can, but some things that are mechanics that don’t really exist in FoL will be up to host discretion. If you have any questions about the nature of feedback in this game, feel free to ask in your classcard.
